reference.title: Reproduction Black Market Items
reference.shortdesc: Optimize your horses' breeding by apply a Black Market Item from the reproduction category to your mare.

table.title: Black Market Items in the Reproduction Category

row.entry: The inborn skills of a foal that will be born are increased by 50%.
Your mare ages twice as fast. The earnings from the lessons are doubled during this time.
Get an extra covering for your divine horse. Applies to Falabellas, Falacorns, Zebras and Jennies and can only be applied after their initial covering limit is reached.
Choose the coat for your foal. Select the coat among the ones available for your horse's breed.

entry.p: Save on items bought individually and enjoy an exclusive item:

row.entry: Be 100% sure of giving birth to unicorns. Complete the covering without starting a unicorn covering session.
Get an extra covering for your donkey or draft horse. Applies to all breeds of donkey and draft horse.
Change your horse's gender. Does not apply to geldings and pregnant mares.
